column1: I have had the course 'Algoritmer og Datastrukturer' at NTNU.
column2: I think that I would like to use VirtSort frequently.
column3: I found VirtSort to be simple.
column4: I thought VirtSort was easy to use.
column5: I think that I could use VirtSort without the support of a technical person.
column6: I found the various functions in VirtSort were well integrated.
column7: I thought there was a lot of consistency in VirtSort.
column8: I would imagine that most people would learn to use VirtSort very quickly.
column10: I felt very confidence using VirtSort.
column11: I could use VirtSort without having to learn anything new.
